channel.title: [317] [PI] MonsterScape [PI] [317]
channel.description:
Hi everyone. I am currently working on a new server called MonsterScape! The base for the server is OverloadX which is based off Project Insanity. I am wanting to put the server online in about 3-4 weeks so i need all the help i can get. I am looking for someone who can host 24/7 (possibly with a VPS) until i can get my VPS, a source coder, a client coder (i need you to know how to code a webclient to), and a website/graphic designer. If you can please fill up two or more positions. When the server is up and running, for each position you hold, you will get 10 percent of the donations. It wont be very much but its something. You will also get a staff position on the server and forums if you want one.
[u]Working Things on the Server [/u] Godwars (except saradomin) Barrows Pest Control KBD Daggonoths All working skills Dclaws spec All Godsword specs pking system you earn 2 pk points per kill. there are more working things just dont remember them all...
if you wanna know more stuff just ask.
Hoster (0/1) :( Source Coder (0/1) :( Client/Webclient Coder (0/1) :( Website/Graphic Designer (0/1) :(
[size=18pt]This will be an amazing server![/size]
More pictures will come soon!
Thanks!
[size=12pt]Picture 1: Customs, Chaotics, and working overload[/size]

item.title: [317] [PI] MonsterScape [PI] [317]
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

You know what, I’ll be a source developer and source coder. The reason is because liamp your a person who knows a lot of stuff but acts like an asshole.
Heres my app:
What’s your name?:
Where are you from?:
How long have you been with RSPS?: 2 years.
How long can you stay online on day?: 5-6hrs
What job you choosed?: server developer and source developer
How long can you host?(If you choosed hoster): 23/7
Why do you think your good/worth the job?: I have coded my own server from almost blank sources.
Skype: judostar11

item.description:
@getting_icy wrote:

Hi everyone. I am currently working on a new server called MonsterScape! The base for the server is OverloadX which is based off Project Insanity. I am wanting to put the server online in about 3-4 weeks so i need all the help i can get. I am looking for someone who can host 24/7 (possibly with a VPS) until i can get my VPS, a source coder, a client coder (i need you to know how to code a webclient to), and a website/graphic designer. If you can please fill up two or more positions. When the server is up and running, for each position you hold, you will get 10 percent of the donations. It wont be very much but its something. You will also get a staff position on the server and forums if you want one.

Working Things on the Server

Godwars (except saradomin)
Barrows
Pest Control
KBD
Daggonoths
All working skills

All Godsword specs
pking system you earn 2 pk points per kill.
there are more working things just dont remember them all…

if you wanna know more stuff just ask.
